com.loveboyuan.smarttrader

Class TradeHistoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loveboyuan.smarttrader.TradeHistoryController

  • public class TradeHistoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by boyuangu on 2015-10-24. TradeHistoryController keeps a unique copy of TradeHistory by applying the singleton design pattern; it also does the book-keeping with the elastic search server to request the TradeHistory on demand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradeHistoryController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addTradeToServer(Trade trade)
      Push the local unique copy of Trade to the elastic search server after converting it to json.
      static void clear() 
      static TradeHistory getTradeHistory()
      Singleton method to return a unique copy of TradeHistory upon invocation.
      static void removeTradeFromServer(Trade trade)
      Remove the specific Trade from the elastic search server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static void addTradeToServer(Trade trade)

        public static void removeTradeFromServer(Trade trade)
